author: bartr
post_text: March 25, 2015 at 7:21 PM#1Hello everyone,I'm searching for a macro to set all my fade (%) of all chasers.What i tried but didn't worked:- setuservar$ fade execbutton1 (buttons begin) thru exexbutton1 (buttons end) at (fadetime?)Anyone a solution?Thanks for reading.Greets
title: Macro for set fade of chaser
